111.title: Answering Your Phone

choices: Kim, with two of her asian friends by her side [Undecided]
1111.content:
"Hi Roran..." says the familiar voice, which causes you to cringe. You were never one for having enemies, but if you had to pick one person you trusted the least, it would be Kim. Whenever she greeted you with that tone in her voice, it was always a sure sign that she was up to something. Perhaps looking to trick or manipulate you, even blackmail you in some way. You could practically hear her sly grin through the phone. You mutter a swear under your breath, wishing you'd checked your caller ID first.

"What is it, Kim?" you say, clearly not thrilled to hear from her. You tried to sound as if you're in a hurry, but failed to mask the sleepiness in your voice. Kim answers, feigning disappointment in a very cute manner as she always did. You hated to admit, she was damn good at it. "Aww, you don't sound happy to hear from me... And here I was, calling to be nice and invite you over." You knew she was just trying to get in your head, but that didn't make it any easier. You can't help but picture her signature pouty face that always made you weak in the knees.

Swallowing a nervous lump in your throat, you retain your composure. "Listen, you can't fool me anymore. Even if I didn't know you were up to something, why the heck would I want to come over after all the times you've humiliated me?!" "Well...." she replied, her confident tone making you uneasy. "You're coming over one way or another. I'm sure you wouldn't want certain... photographs being posted all over the school walls now, would you?" "What photos?! You're bluffing!" You snap. Kim simply replies with a confident giggle.

As much as you wished she were bluffing, you could only think back to a few months earlier, when a fellow classmate arrived at school only to find a variety of embarrassing photographs of him up and down all the hallways, plastered on random lockers. The poor kid was traumatized and had to transfer out a week later. Nobody ever found out who was responsible, but you knew it was Kim. Her smug, satisfied expression practically confessed it.

After a short moment, you groan in frustration under your breath, realizing you had to comply. Kim, knowing she'd won, cheerfully says "Great! See you in an hour!" before hanging up the phone.

Already dreading to find out what the day brings, you sigh and get up, going about your usual morning routine. You shower, get dressed, eat a quick cereal breakfast, brush your teeth, and so on, before heading out the door nearly an hour later. Unfortunately for you, her house was only a short walk away, and you arrive at her doorstep right on time. You weren't exactly eager to find out what she wanted, but there was no turning back now. You reach a hand up to ring her doorbell, but before you can, the front door swings open and you're greeted by...
1111.title: Devious Kim

choices: You try to get ready and reach her house in time
You decide you'd rather sleep in some more
1112.content:
"Hi Roran!" Katie shouted over the phone, in a playful matter. You couldn't help but yawn, still recovering from your sleep as you got up and wandered into the kitchen. "Oh hi Katie. What's up?" You said, trying your hardest to not sound tired. You spot some donuts on the counter and quickly grab one, taking a bite. Normally you'd wait till after the phone convo, but you're starving since you'd slept through breakfast.

"Uh oh, you sound like you just woke up... You haven't forgotten our plans for today, have you? You said you were coming over for our Mario Kart re-match at 10 this morning.. It's almost 9:50!" You nearly choke on your food, realizing you'd completely forgotten. You didn't want to disappoint her, since she's the only girl you know who actually enjoys video games. "No, of course not!" You say, trying your best to speak with a full mouth, unintentionally spitting crumbs everywhere. "I was just finishing breakfast, I'm heading out the door right now!"

"Great! See you in a few minutes." Katie said, before hanging up.

11121.content:
In a hurry, you put down the phone and stuff the rest of the donut into your mouth as you sprint into the bathroom. You take a quick shower, brush your teeth, dry off and throw on some clean clothes in no longer than 5 minutes, before you run out the door. Luckily she only lived a few blocks away, but you'd still have to haul it to get there on time.

By the time you reach her doorstep, you're completely out of breath. Panting for air and hunched over with your hands on your knees, you reach up and ring her doorbell. Before you even have time to remove your finger from the button, you hear the door swing open in front of you. You look up to see Katie in the doorway, giggling at you.

Even though she's just a friend, you've always found her extremely cute. Whether she knows that or not, you were never sure. She has long, thick red hair that she'd normally kept in a ponytail, but today she left it messily draping over her shoulders. She has pale skin, and a fair amount of freckles on her face, especially on the bridge of her nose. She's fairly tall, standing a few inches taller than you. She wore a loose white t-shirt and a pair of jean shorts, which hugged her thick athletic thighs nicely. She wasn't skinny by any means, being a bit on the curvy side, but she was still in great shape as she was pretty active in sports.

"Well are you gonna come in or not?! We don't have all day." She playfully grabs your arm and pulls you inside, practically dragging you as she led you down to the basement. She'd always had a perky personality, but for some reason she seemed unusually excited this morning. You couldn't help but notice her grinning to herself, in an almost mischievous manner.

You look around once you reached her basement. It was a very cozy, dimly-lit area with a large couch and a few sofa chairs positioned in front of a big screen TV. On it was the title screen for Mario Kart, as she'd already had the Wii turned on with 2 controllers ready to go. You eagerly plop yourself down on the sofa and grab a controller. Just then, Katie suddenly steps in between you and the TV with her hands on her hips, looking down at you with a smirk. "Before we start, I was thinking... We've been played this same old game so many times now. What if we made a bet with each other, to make things more interesting?" She raised an eyebrow as she looked at you.

"Hmm.. That sounds fun actually, sure why not!" You say, scratching the back of your head lightly "What would we bet though? I was in such a hurry, I left my wallet at home.."

Katie bites her lower lip, before responding. "How about... we do best out of 3 races. If you win, I'll bake those cookies you love any time you want, for the rest of the month. And if you lose, well... I get to do whatever I want to you..." You didn't like the way she was smiling at you. You reply, "Hmm... I don't know, that last part of the bet is pretty vague."

"What's the matter, afraid I'm gonna beat you again?" She grins.

"What?! Don't get cocky, you've beaten me once and only once this past month! Fine, you're on."

She yays cutely and plops down next to you, picking up a controller before saying, "And remember, a bet's a bet. You can't back out now." You nod in understandment, and the two of you start the game.

Throughout the race, you stayed in the lead. You couldn't help but smile to yourself, knowing all the delicious cookies you'd be eating soon. From time to time you'd taunt her, reminding her of all the baking she'd soon be stuck doing, but she just shrugged it off, seeming strangely confident. Finally, just as you near the finish line, you get nailed from behind with a shell and can only watch as she speeds passed you, winning the round. She lets out a loud "Ha!!" and elbows you in the side, obviously payback for all your gloating. You grumble under your breath "Fine, that's just one... It's still best out of three..." She sticks her tongue out at you, clearly excited about being 1 race away from winning the bet.

As you get ready to start the second race, curiousity gets the best of you, and you ask, "So erm... what exactly are you planning to do, if by some slim chance you do win?... Not that you're going to." She turns to look at you, biting her lip again before saying "Well... you remember that time a few months ago, when I'd had too much to drink, and spilled my most secret erm.... fantasy to you?"

"Yep, wh-..." You go a little pale, starting to realize what she's implying. "Why?" She simply pulls a tiny box out of her pocket and waves it teasingly while flashing you a toothy grin, before putting it away and winking at you. You couldn't help but think back to the last time you'd seen it. It was a few months before, she'd called you in a panic with a serious problem. To make a long story short, her dog ate something it shouldn't have, and supposedly had shrunk and disappeared in her room somewhere. You thought she was pulling a prank on you until you found it... sitting under her bed, no larger than the size of the bug. That's when she first showed you the little box, full of pills. She said she must've dropped one on the floor, where the dog later found and ate it. For the next few days, she had to feign sadness after convincing her parents that it ran away during the night, at least until the effects wore off and it "mysteriously" returned to the doorstep.

Your thoughts flash forward to a few days later, the two of you were leaving a party at 4 AM, and you decided to walk her home. She was pretty wasted at the time, and you let curiousity get the best of you, by asking why she had the strange shrinking pills. And that's when she opened up to you as a vorarephile. She spilled every little vore fantasy she thinks about, every possible way it can be done, every entry way she'd want to vore someone through. It took a while to sink in, but you were okay with it, and promised to keep her secret as long as she promised to never try to fulfill her fantasy on anyone without their consent, knowing nobody would be crazy enough to wish something as horrible as vore upon themselves.

You only get to rest for a few seconds, before you feel a sudden gush of air, accompanied by a loud snorting noise that boomed all around you. "Oh no.." You're suddenly pulled from where you lay, and forced head first into what felt like the soft back of her throat. You're helpless to stop it with the strings still binding your firmly, and you feel yourself sliding downward along what you could only assume to be her slick throat. Finally, you land on something that felt bumpy and a little firmer, which you seem to stick to for the moment. You realize it's the back her tongue! You can feel the back of her throat hungrily pulsing to accept you, right in front of your face. You tense up, afraid of slipping down, especially now with her foul breath overwhelming your senses and giving you a small taste of what awaits. It reeked of a bad combination of omelettes and orange juice.
1112111212.title: Down You Go

11121112121.content:
You hear a giggle vibrate all around you, and suddenly a bright light shines in, making your surroundings visible. You realize she's opening her mouth, and get a sudden hope that she's about to pull you out. That hope quickly fades you though, as you feel gravity shift again, causing you to start sliding head first into her pulsing throat, getting strands of warm saliva all over your face in the process. You realize she only opened her mouth to give you a good look down her throat before she sends you there, the walls of it quivering with anticipation for you. Finally, everything goes black again, and you feel the throat muscles tense up around your upper half, pulling you down. In a matter of seconds, your whole body was being squeezed downward fairly quickly. You were relieved that there wasn't as much mucus this time around, only saliva, but your relief quickly fades as the foul smell from below grew more and more intense.

Finally, you feel yourself come to what feels like the stomach's sphincter, and come to a stop, but only for a second. Before you know it, it widens open and starts squeezing you through. Instantly you're struck by the the most acrid, powerful smell you've ever encountered, causing you to gag and try to hold your breath. The sphincter squeezes your chest, followed by your waist and legs as it squeezes you through, before dropping you straight down. Luckily you land on your back with a *plop*, on what feels like mushy partially-digested food. The heat and humidity in the stomach was overwhelming, it feels like you're in an oven. Unable to hold your breath any longer, you gasp for air and immediately choke and cough from the acrid stench again. You try to roll out of the disgusting thick slop, but realize you're slowly sinking, as if it were quicksand. You start screaming as your legs sink underneath, followed by your waist, stomach and chest. But to your relief, your feet reach the bottom and you stop sinking once it's over your shoulders. You notice Katie giggling after hearing your screams, and patting her belly a few times, causing your surroundings to shake.

You began to get used to the smell, but just enough that you weren't gagging anymore. It was still difficult to breath. As you sit there up to your neck in chunky thick stomach matter, you can't help but notice how deafening her stomach is. You can hear gurgling and churning all around you, along with Katie's heartbeat, and you start to feel a little motion sick from the motion of her stomach. Occasional strands of bile drop from above, sometimes landing on your head and causing you to squirm more. This goes on for a few more moments, until you notice something horrifying. Your skin was beginning to tingle all over, even itching a bit in some places. Reality sinks in as you realize Katie left enough air in her stomach for you to breath for quite some time.

Just when you thought things couldn't get any worse, you're suddenly thrown from where you sat, and tossed around her belly. She must have been shaking her stomach, trying to torture you! You couldn't help but scream as this happened, wishing the torment would end. As much as you screamed, you still couldn't drown out the sound of Katie's laughter. Finally, the strings that bound you come lose, likely with the help of the stomach acid, but it didn't do you any good as you couldn't get any footing. She kept this up for a few more minutes, making sure to get you completely covered in her stomach bile, before growing bored. Exhausted, you plop yourself down and lean back against the wall, panting for air, the sweltering heat taking a toll on you. Now your skin was beginning to sting, the pain growing worse with each passing second. After a while, it becomes unbearable, and you begin to scream again, cursing Katie for being so cruel as to keep you alive.

On the outside, Katie could hear your muffled screams coming from her belly. The feeling of control and power excited her so much, she sprawled herself out on the couch, slipping one of her hands down into her panties. Her breathing grows heavy as she fingers herself at a slow pace, listening to your cries of agony. Once she could hear her stomach kick into full gear, gurgling and churning around you and drowning out your voice, she nearly climaxed. She then kept her hand still for a moment to let her self come down, before starting up again, wanting to draw this out for as long as possible.

Over the next hour or two, your cries grew fainter and fainter, and she decided it was time. She started rubbing her clit more frantically, and is suddenly hit by the strongest orgasm she'd ever felt in her life. She moans loudly, squirming around in place with her toes curling up. Her orgasm was so intense, even her stomach seemed to tense up, squeezing you and mashing stomach matter all over you. This goes on for a good 10 seconds straight, before she finally relaxes and tries to catch her breath, her tongue flopped out of the corner of her mouth like a satisfied puppy. Totally content, she drifts off into a deep sleep, leaving you at the mercy of her unrelenting belly. Soon you follow, passing out once you'd used up all the oxygen. All that was left was the sound of her belly gurgling, breaking you down in order to be absorbed, and become nothing but fat on the belly that so hellishly snuffed you out.
11121112121.title: Into Her Stomach

111211122.content:
You gaze up in horror into the darkness of one of her nostrils as she sniffles again, her nose quite stuffy from the sound of it. You're overcome with the sudden realization that you'll soon be submerged in whatever foulness lies inside, never to see the light of day again. In desperation, you begin struggling between her fingers. "Please, don't put me in there! Anywhere but there!" Hearing your begging, a broad smile forms on Katie's lips, which caused the dark nostril that loomed over to you to widen slightly. And with that, she tightened her grip on you and thrust you inside up to your elbows, with your arms pinned at your sides. Her nostril bulged slightly to accept you, as it was a bit of a tight fit. You immediately start to scream, but your muffled cries were barely audible through her soft nose. She then releases her fingers from you, the flesh of her nose holding you firmly in place.

You soon feel her fingertip press firmly against your legs, and start to slide you deeper into her nasal passage. You cry out again, disgusted by the feeling of nose hair brushing against your face, some of them covered in globs of mucus that smeared over you. As you feel your thighs being engulfed by the fleshy walls and vanishing from the outside world, you notice the walls around you are growing slimier, coating your body in ooze which clung to you like glue. By the time you're in up to your knees, you begin to gag, your surroundings only growing worse as you inched upward. You try to squirm, but you had no room to move, the slimy passage hugging you too tightly.

Eventually you feel your captor's fingertip force your feet the rest of the way in. Not yet satisfied, Katie presses her finger up her nose a little ways, making sure you were firmly tucked inside, before removing it. This far in, you find the squishy walls and mucus that clung to you to be uncomfortably warm, the air ahead of you becoming much like a sauna. The heat in combination with the foul environment made this a living hell for you. But just as you thought things couldn't be any worse, Katie smirks to herself, getting an evil idea. She starts scrunching and wiggling her nose, causing the fleshy walls to squeeze and rub against you, churning her glue-like snot all over you. With each scrunch of her nose, she could hear a faint, muffled scream from within. You begin to retch as hot mucus drips through your hair and down your face, your arms pinned too tightly at your sides to do anything about it.

After a good minute or two, Katie grows bored of torturing you and decides to finishing things. She tilts her head back a bit, tossing her hair back over her shoulders, and begins to sniff. You can't help but cry out, feeling a sudden shift in gravity, followed by a pressure change that made your ears pop. You then lurch forward, sliding further into the slick, dark tunnel. It takes you a moment to realize what's happening, and to your despair, the soft walls hug you far too tightly for air any air to pass, denying you any cool breeze from below as your environment only grew more uncomfortably hot. You cry out again as you're dragged deeper and deeper, not knowing what lies ahead. On the outside, your muffled screams gradually fade away, the bulge in her nose disappearing into the freckled bridge between her eyes.

To your surprise, you're soon forced into a spacious cavity, no larger to you than a small closet. With a splat, you land on your back in a hot pool of mucus. You sigh with relief, at first glad that you're no longer being sucked through one of the most horrible places in Katie's body, never intended for human life. But before you have time to think, you can feel the sphincter-like opening at your feet beginning to close. A feeling of dread washes over you, and not wanting to be trapped forever where you lie, you pull yourself upright and try to make a dive for the opening. To your surprise, the thick snot clings to your back and jerks you back into your resting position as if it were stretchy rubber cement, just in time for you to feel the exit seal shut beneath your feet.

You shout in frustration and pound a fist against the membrane wall above you, but let out an "Eep!" as the walls contract against you in response. The soft, wrinkled surface of the lining seems to squeeze and massage every part of your body, secreting mucus as it did so. You cough a bit, trying your hardest to keep any foul substances out of your mouth. Just then, your surroundings appear to stretch for a few seconds, only to contract again, even more mucus oozing through unseen pores. As disgusting as this was, you may have learned to enjoy the feeling if it weren't as hot as an oven inside.

This process continues to repeat itself as the mucus content seems to pool around your legs. You try to pull your feet out of the muck, but only manage to slip, falling into a kneeling position with the substance up to your waist and elbows. You try to get back up, but strands cling to your arms and legs some like kind of liquid rubber, drawing you further into it. You were helpless as the mysterious cavity kicked into full gear, churning you around without mercy as the wrinkled flesh compressed against you. You noticed you're losing feeling in your limbs, and your skin begins to tingle all over. You think to yourself, "Oh no... It's dissolving me!" Your struggles grow weaker, and finally come to a stop as you start accepting your fate, no longer able to feel most of your body. You can't help but be relieved the process is painless, unlike being in a stomach.

As you were submerged up to your neck, you feel your eyelids growing heavy from exhaustion, lack of air, and the effects of the tar-like slime that worked away at you. At this point, you had no idea how much of you had been dissolved into more mucus. You could hear sloshes and gurgles all around you, beckoning you to sleep. Shutting your eyes, you can't help but think of how humiliating it is to meet your end in a girl's cute and seemly harmless nose. And with that last thought, you drift out of consciousness, nothing left for you to do except dissolve into the same gross snot that plagues Katie's nose.
111211122.title: Messy Demise

11122.content:
You quickly down the rest of your donut, finishing your quick meal. Glancing over at the clock, you can't help but let out another sleepy yawn. "9:55... there's no way I'll get to Katie's on time." You sigh under your breath. "Ah, what's another 10 minutes. I don't think she'll mind..." You hobble back to your room and plop down on the bed for a quick nap. In under a minute, you're out cold.

You awaken some time later to a strange feeling on the back of your neck, as if you're being watched. You blink tiredly and glance over at your clock. "Oh no... it's after 11 AM" you think to yourself. Just then, you hear someone clear their throat in the room. Surprised, you turn to see who it is, and there you see Katie standing at the foot of your bed. She was wearing her long red hair in a ponytail, as usual. Her clothes were fairly simple, a white t-shirt and a long pair of jeans that hugged her curvy, yet athletic legs nicely. She stands a few inches taller than you, making her one of the tallest of your friends. She had a fairly pale complexion, aside from the cute freckles that were scattered across her face. You always did find her pretty cute, though you did your best to keep it a secret.

She had her arms folded across her chest, and she didn't look pleased. "K-katie!" You gasp, surprised. "How did you get in here?... er... I swear, I was just on my way over, and... I guess I dozed off..." You go to sit up, but realize your wrists won't budge. You look at each of them, realizing they're both tied firmly to your bed posts with thin rope. "What the... What is this?!" You tug at them, trying to get your wrists free, but they won't budge.

She slowly walks next to you, before sitting herself down right on your stomach, her legs draped over the side of the bed. She begins running a hand through your hair, which would've been enjoyable if it weren't for her icy stare. "Roran, you know how much I hate it when you leave me waiting. And yet, here you are again. I guess I see now how little our friendship means to you, and for that..." She re-positions herself, lifting a leg over so that she's straddling you in a kneeling position. She grins, before finishing her sentence. "I think you should be punished." Just then you hear the front door of the house open, and some body walk in. "Ah, and there's my help now!" She smiles, almost seeming a bit eager now.

"Punished?! You can't be serious, how are you going t... Wait, what help? Who's in my house? Katie, this isn't funny..." You say, growing a little nervous. Just then, the bedroom door opens, and in walks Stacey. She was one of Katie's best friends, and an absolute bombshell. She had long, wavy, dirty blonde hair that reached a bit passed her shoulders, and had the body of a model. One of her features you noticed the most though, was her smile. She had a somewhat wide mouth with very prominent front teeth, but they were the whitest, most straight and perfect teeth you'd ever seen. Even when she wasn't smiling, her mouth seemed strangely sexy, and you always had a hard time not staring whenever you talked to her. On the downside though, she always was a bit of a mean person, and you never did get along with her. This time though, something about her smile made you feel uneasy. "Hey Roran, thanks for having me over.." She winks.

Katie suddenly blurts out to her friend, "You grab his legs and take care of his feet, I'll do rest." Katie then turns her attention back down to you, and grins. "You know.. you never should have told me how ticklish you are." Stacey happily walks over to your feet with a smile on her face, as if she'd been wanting to do this for a long time. She climbs onto the foot of your bed and straddles your legs, her back facing Katie's. She grabs your ankles, and holds them tightly together. Knowing what comes next, you start to twist and turn, squirming to get your legs free, but it's no use. You could swear you heard Stacey giggle from behind Katie. "Oh no..." You say out loud, feeling completely helpless. "Look... maybe we can talk this ov-"

"NOW!" Shouted Katie. The two of them immediately start to tickle you all over without mercy, Stacey was being especially unforgiving against the soles of your feet, your most sensitive spot. Meanwhile, Katie worked her fingers all across your stomach, your rubs, and most of all, your arm pits. You burst into a laughing fit, squirming uncontrollably from their unrelenting torture. Seconds felt like minutes, and you didn't know how long you could take it. You begin begging them to stop the best you can through your laughter, but this only seemed to bring a satisfied smile to Katie's lips. After what feels like an eternity, though likely no more than a minute or two, you have tears welling up in your eyes from laughing so hard. The only thing you can do at this point is try and work your wrists free. After a couple minutes, the ropes start to loosen, but you can hardly breath from all your laughter. Finally, after 4 or 5 minutes of this, the two of them stop. You lie there, panting to catch your breath "Oh... oh thank god." You gasp out. Katie leans up close to your face with a broad smile, and says "What, you think we're finished? Oh, this is only the beginning. We plan to keep this up for... well over an hour." The two of them giggle, especially after seeing your eyes go wide.

You beg, "P-please.. no more. I've learned my lesson, I'll do anything you ask from now on I swear! Just let me go.." Katie smirks, and replies "Tempting, but... I don't believe you. Ready for round 2?" Out of desperation, you manage to rip your wrists free from the ropes and manage to shove Katie against the wall at the side of your bed. She falls against it with a loud *thud* and swears loudly, rubbing her head. You then manage to jerk a foot free, and shove Stacey off the foot of the bed before she can react. Not wanting to stick around when they're angry, you don't hesitate to jump off the bed and try to make a break for it towards the door. But before you can take a single step away from the bed, you feel Katie's grab against the back of your shirt collar and forcefully jerk you back against the bed. You try to pull free, not caring if your shirt gets ripped, but her thighs suddenly wrap around your neck at the edge of the bed. "Ack!" You choke out, trying to pry them loose with your hands, but it's no use. She then keeps one leg straight, but bends the other around your neck to hold you in place, making a sort of 4 figure with her legs.

Stacey gets up and storms in front of you looking like she's ready to throw a punch, but she stops herself and gazes down at you, a smirk of amusement creeping across her face as she watched you struggle, enjoying seeing you so helpless. Katie then says to her, "Alright Stacey, we've had our fun... I think we'd better go through with the rest of our plan." Stacey smiles broadly and nods. You try to ask, "What plan? What are you doing to d-gagh!" but Katie quickly cuts you off by squeezing your neck with her legs.

Next, Stacey closes her eyes and starts chanting in some language you'd never heard before. You quirked an eyebrow, not sure what she was doing, but you're quickly distracted by Katie as she teasingly starts running her fingers through your hair. "I hope you're ready for this" She giggles. You start nervously wondering what she means, before realizing something strange. As Stacey chanted, a small ball of light began to form in front of her, growing brighter as her chanting continued. You didn't know what it was, but you didn't like it. After a full minute of this, her chanting finally stops. She opens her eyes and gazes at you one last time with a devilish grin, before moving her arm with a quick motion, sending the ball of light straight at...
11122.title: Sleeping In

111221.content:
As the ball of light hits her, it seems to vanish instantly on contact. Without a second to spare, she starts throwing off her clothes, stripping naked. Your jaw drops as you watch, still not entirely sure what's going on. All you knew for sure was the girl had an absolutely stunning body, beyond everything you've imagined. Once she'd removed the last article of clothing, her entire body seemed to start glowing, emitting a bright blue light. Before you knew it, her figure appeared to be growing in size before your very eyes, growing taller and taller at a shocking rate. Once she'd reached the ceiling, she simply got on her knees and still continued to grow. You're so overwhelmed in shock by what you're seeing, that you never even notice Katie release you from her grip and hop off the the bed, moving to the doorway where she's out of the way.

Finally, Stacey stopped growing just as the bright light vanishes. By then, she barely had room to move, her legs spread apart and seeming to surround most of the room. Katie looks at the two with a satisfied expression, and says "I'll give you two some privacy... and Stacey? Have fun.. I know how long you've wanted this." And with a wink, she walks out. You quickly look up at Stacey, slowly coming out of your shock, and manage to ask "Fun? Wait, what are you up to.." You look at her cautiously as you inch back onto the bed behind you.

Stacey stared down at you with a hungry gaze, slowly running her tongue over her lips. A loud rumbling sound suddenly fills the room, and it takes you a moment to realize it's coming from her stomach. "Oh! Excuse me.." she chuckles, rubbing a hand over her belly. She then leans her face close to you, causing you to crawl back into the corner, before she speaks. "For as long as I've known you, I've hated your guts... That I'm sure you know." Her hot, smelly breath washes over you, and you try your hardest to ignore it. But the smell of a gross combination of bacon, eggs and orange juice was a bit overwhelming. "But what you don't know... is what I've fantasized about constantly, since the day we met." She smirks, before continuing. "I'm what you'd call a vorarephile." You suddenly get a bad feeling in the pit of your stomach. You've heard of such a thing on the internet, but you never paid it any attention since it seemed pretty harmless... or so you thought.

"Your friend Katie was kind enough to give me this opportunity, to make my fantasies come true." She licks her lips again, seeming to grow excited now as one of her hands trails down between her legs. You glance towards the door, wondering if you could make a break for it, but one of her feet completely blocked the exit. She begins to slowly teasing her clit with her fingers, as she continued talking. "Nothing excites me more than the thought of you, small and helpless, struggling as I swallow you down, whole and alive" She bites her lower lip. "Once you're in my stomach, it wouldn't stop there... I'd swallow some air for you, to keep you alive and squirming for as long as possible while my stomach churns away at you." She moans softly. "Ohh... I do hope you scream for me. And believe me... you'll want to." She grins at you, enjoying your frightened expression.

Finally she stops teasing herself with her fingers, and clears her throat. "Now then, I think we'd better..."
111221.title: Growing Trouble

1112211.content:
With another loud rumble from Katie's stomach, she sprawls herself out across the room, with her back leaning against the wall towards the foot of your bed. Before you have time to react, she reaches over with both of her giant arms, and lifts your bed up onto her lap. You grip the sheets tightly, trying your best not to fall off. She then brings the foot of your bed level with her mouth, and gives you one last teasing smile, showing off as many teeth as she can before licking her lips. "Goodbye, Roran... I hope this is as unpleasant for you as it is in my fantasies."

And with that, she begins lifting the bed slowly, tilting the foot of it down towards her mouth. Still facing her with your back towards the bed, you try to push yourself back and away from her mouth using your hands and feet, but this quickly proves unsuccessful as the sheets come loose, sending you back down towards her. You gasp and fling your hands up over your head, just barely managing to grab the top edge of the bed with the tips of your fingers, stopping your descent for the moment as the bed's incline steepened.

[Work in Progress]
1112211.title: Bedroom Nightmare [WIP]

112.content:
Your alarm! You spring out of bed, realizing that you're already late for school. Without so much as taking a look at the mirror, you throw on a pair of shorts and some shoes and grab your backpack. You're at least fully clothed. However, this still doesn't change the fact that you're late, so you run straight out of the house without grabbing a bite to eat or cleaning up. Thankfully, you don't live too far from the school, so you won't be as late as you could have been if you lived farther away.

Then again, this isn't the first time you've been late. You've got more than one teacher who will probably be fairly upset with you. As you arrive on campus, you take a look at your schedule. Which class are you late for?
112.title: Late!

1121.content:
"Oh crap..." You can't help but breathe to yourself as you see that your first class of the day is math. The period is already more than half over, so you decide it might be better for everyone if you didn't show up at all. Rather than embarrass yourself and waste the class's time, you hang around in the halls until the period is over. You know you'll get in trouble anyway, but at least this way it can be dealt with over email, and you might not even have to deal with your extremely strict math teacher, Ms. Hayes, face to face. However, once you think you're in the clear, you turn a corner and nearly bump into the very person you've been trying to avoid.

Ms. Hayes puts her hands on her hips and stares down at you. "And where have you been?" she asks, her voice as cold as ever. "Cutting my class?" Ms. Hayes's long nostrils flare in anger, reminding you of the school's general opinion of her. Most of your friends agree that 29-year-old Ms. Hayes is hot, if you're willing to ignore her ice-cold personality, short temper, and large nose. Ms. Hayes's nose is easily big enough for the student body to make fun of, and rumor has it that she has a special punishment for anyone she catches making fun of her nose.

"No ma'am, I..." You try to explain yourself. You thought you were being courteous by not interrupting the class, but clearly Ms. Hayes has other ideas. "Come with me to my office," she said, turning away and walking down the hall. You know you could have tried to make a run for it, but now that she wanted to deal with you personally, that would only make it worse in the long run. Ms. Hayes leads you to her office and offers you a drink of water. Knowing better than to refuse, you take a sip before she has to repeat herself.

"What did you hope to accomplish by coming to school so late? Did you want to just skip my class, or all of them?" Ms. Hayes asks, sitting down at her desk. She gestures to the chair in front of it, actually offering you the choice to sit down. You sit, not wanting to take your chances. However, you are starting to get fed up with her questions. "I didn't mean to skip any classes," you say, taking another sip of water. "I was at home. I-" You try to explain that you slept in, but Ms. Hayes cuts you off again before you can. "And what were you doing at home?" You have finally had enough of her questions, so you snap back at her without thinking. "Maybe you should keep your nose out of my personal life!" You only realize what you actually said once it's too late. However, Ms. Hayes strangely doesn't seem offended. She simply takes your cup and pours you some more water.

"Please, have another drink," she says, handing it back to you. Not wanting to make her any angrier than she must already be, you take the glass and drink again. Within seconds, you begin to feel light-headed, and then you pass out. When you wake up, you don't know how much time has passed, but you can tell that you're no longer in the chair you were sitting in. Where are you?
1121.title: Math

11211.content:
You look around, not exactly sure where you are. You're definitely not in the chair anymore, that much is certain. The ground under you is soft and warm, but it still doesn't indicate where you are. Your train of thought is suddenly interrupted by Ms. Hayes clearing her throat. You jump at the sound, as it seems much louder than usual. As you happen to look up, you nearly scream at what you see above you. Ms. Hayes is staring down at you, but she's huge! Whatever you're sitting on is right in front of her face, but something's not right. Ms. Hayes looks like some sort of giant before your eyes.

"Are you awake now?" she asks, her voice as stern as ever. "Y-yes," you reply, still shocked and confused. "Good. I was getting tired of waiting. I'm sure by now you can tell that things have changed. More specifically, you've shrunk." Finally, it hits you. You realize that you're sitting in the palm of Ms. Hayes's hand! "What? How?" you stammer, unable to think clearly enough to ask anything else. "I'm sure you've heard that I have a special punishment for anyone who makes fun of my nose. It's true, and you're about to find out what it is," Ms. Hayes says, bringing you even closer to her face. Her large nose is right in front of you, giving you a true appreciation for how huge it really is. "What is it?" you asked, sounding nervous. Ms. Hayes smiles and lowers you away from her face slightly.

"It's nothing too terrible. If you do what I tell you, everything will be fine. You'll eventually return to your normal size and you won't remember anything that happened. Well, you'll remember one thing: never make fun of my nose." You almost sigh with relief, but you remember that this is Ms. Hayes you're dealing with. If you make it look like it's not so bad, she'll find some way to change your mind. "Put simply, I just need your help with cleaning something." You swallow, feeling afraid now. You've been in her class long enough to know that when Ms. Hayes says "put simply," something horrible and complicated is bound to follow. "What do you need help cleaning?"
11211.title: Her Special Punishment

1122.content:
Physical Education! You groan, already dreading your least favorite class as you make your way into the locker room. Inside, you find it totally deserted, all the other students already in the gym. As you open your locker to change, you can't help but gaze towards the exit, wondering if it's even worth attending with the period half-over. With a sigh, you decide against it and shut your locker door, turning to leave.

Just as you do though, you bump into someone's chest and let out a soft "Oof..." As you stumble back, you realized you'd bumped into...
1122.title: Locker Room Encounter

choices: flared his nostrils ever so slightly.
licked his lips, his stomach letting out a rumble against you.
11221.content:
As you stumble back, you gaze up to find Chad, the class bully, grinning down at you. You couldn't help but feel intimidated by the way he towered over you, standing at a massive 6'3" in his P.E. uniform (loose shirt and shorts). Before you can react, he shoves you forcefully back into the locker and pins you there, both fists tightly gripping your shirt against your chest. "Where do you think you're going, twerp? Skipping class again, are we? I don't think so." He said, his tight grip lifting you an inch or two off the ground.

"Ch.. Chad!" You stutter out. "I wasn't! I was just... Ow, damnit, put me down!" You cry out, just before he slams you against the locker again, looking down his nose at you and leaning in close enough for you to feel his stinky warm breakfast breath waft against your face. "Oh, I don't think so. Not after last week... Remember what I said? If I ever caught you trying to weasel out of a beating in P.E. again, I'd make you pay." And you're gonna wish you never crossed paths with me. Now... let's make sure nobody ever finds you."

1132.title: Halloween!

choices: [Anal vore/smell torture, additional choice for another to intervene?]
11322.content:
You see the girl eagerly holding out a near-empty candy bag, waiting for your contribution. She was wrapped from head to toe in an extremely long, white strip of fabric, which covered her everywhere except for her eyes and mouth. You had to admit, someone did a damn good job of her costume. You couldn't spot any ends to the fabric, or even tell if it was multiple strips, or just one long piece that made up the entire thing. Most impressive, though, was the fact that what seemed to be a 12-year old girl could trick or treat all day without the costume unraveling.

You sigh, knowing you'd forgotten to buy candy, and every kid who comes to your porch today, starting with this mummy, will be leaving disappointed. "Sorry kid, I didn't buy any candy.." The girl's eyes go wide. "What? N-no candy? But it's Halloween!" The kid's eyes narrow, and her expression seems to grow angry, before she speaks again. "You'll regret this, mister! Don't you know what happens to people who break Halloween tradition?!" Tired, you start to grow impatient with the kid complaining, and blurt out "What are ya gonna do, get all your little friends and toilet paper my house? Get lost little girl, there's plenty of other houses around."

You start to shut the door on the girl, but you stop as she suddenly lifts one of her appendaged hands and points it at you. You quirk an eyebrow at him for a second, wondering what the strange kid's trying to do. You're about to shut the door the rest of the way, but before you can, long strips of long mummy cloth stretch out from within the wrappings around her hand, and dart right towards your ankles. You gasp and jump back in surprise, but only manage to tumble and land on your back as the long bandage already binds your ankles firmly together. The girl quickly steps inside your house and slams the door shut behind her using her foot, still holding her hand towards you. You look down toward your legs, and to your horror, the cloth bandages are coiling their way up your legs and thighs at an alarming rate, wrapping you up in a mummified cocoon as they went.

Trying to snap out of your shock over the situation, you shout at the girl. "Hey little girl, stop! I'll buy you candy! I'll go get some right now, just stop this!" You start to panic, the wrappings already working their way up your stomach. You look back up at the kid, only to see her smirking down at you with her piercing green eyes. You didn't know what was more unsettling; the anticipation in her grin, or the way her eyes seemed to glow all on their own.

You cry out in fear as the bandages snatch your wrists and pin them firmly against your sides, cocooning them just like the rest of you as they work their way up your chest and elbows. You try to struggle and break the bindings, or at least squirm away from the kid, but the wrappings are far too tight and durable. Once they'd completely covered your shoulders and started their way up your neck, the girl straddles you, pinning your shoulders to the floor with both hands as she licked her lips over. "Soon you'll learn the true meaning of Halloween..." You start to shout and cry out for help, but you're too late. The bandages are already wrapping your face up, including your mouth, leaving only your eyes exposed. As much as you tried to shout, you only managed to get out a few muffled noises.

Finally, the process comes to an end, leaving you completely mummified beneath her.

info.brief_description: An interactive based around vore scenarios of all sorts.
info.description:
This is my personal anything-goes interactive which I'm using primarily to dump whatever vore & other fantasies are currently on my mind. Just keep in mind, while I love all types of vore, even the more unconventional ones, I tend to favor nose vore pretty often... so if the idea of nose/nasal vore bothers you at all, it may be best not to read ahead. Same goes for those opposed to underage scenes, or or extremely gross descriptions, sometimes even with scat references.

This isn't entirely open to the public to be added to. But if anyone would like to add to it, let me know what you plan to add, and I'll possibly add some choices for you. Just keep in mind, I'm a little picky and may edit your chapters if the grammar is awful, if delete them entirely if you hardly have any detail.

Ignore any choices that have notes in [ ]s, those are simply to remind me what my plans are for those sections.

Any feedback or even requests are encouraged. : )

Anyone can always contact me at: RoranKoga@yahoo.com, or you can simply e-mail me on this website.
